Class ThreeHourPeriod

  • java.lang.Object
    • ThreeHourPeriod

  • public class ThreeHourPeriod
extends java.lang.Object
    The ThreeHourPeriod class stores the forecast information for a three hour period. Used by the GUI, its instances are typically created by the ShortTermForecast class
    Author:
    David Newell, David Langford
